Not only was his DF op but he is actually one of the smartest characters in One Piece. He built the entire Arc Maxim alone, used his fruit to enhance his haki using electromagnetic waves (No character has used their fruit to enhance their haki in the series), used his fruit to RESTART HIS OWN HEART, figured out Luffy's weakness, he also figured out that he can travel through physical matter as long as its conductive enough, and has shown some incredible intelligence feats.

If you see a great white shark and you are in the water with it would that experience make you less scared of seeing a wolf? You are going to be scared in both situations because no matter what your opponent is still stronger than you.

I kinda think that's the point where besides that moment with Andre, Igris and, someone else Sjw can't rely on anyone and NEEDS to do all this by himself. It adds a certain layer of stress knowing that if he messed up then everything is over. I would like to also point out that I'd Mumen Rider was in the SL universe and a Dungeon break happens then he is 100% dieing the first time he attempts to fight back. SL is more realistic which means it has way more deaths which put the characters at a much larger risk. I also think it's due to how the hunters are made which doesn't allow them to get stronger that really makes sjw put himself out there. He NEEDS to get stronger, he NEEDS to stay consistent, he NEEDS to keep putting himself in these situations because he is the only person that can make humans life's better. I see it as more of a bonus to sjw's character than I do a negative to the overall story.

Bro was only able to land the uppercut because of evil and you can call that plot Armour as much as you want. Also his punch did knock Baran's head off his body but Baran's blast that he was chracging up exploded causing the rain to stop so idk why you acting like that's one of sjw's feats.

So the Baran fight wasn't enough struggle?

I would still give the edge to dragon for being the most dangerous man. He has info about Imu which is a MAJOR detriment to the WG, messed with the CD's whole food supply, and has been causing rebellions across the world and he hasn't even made his move yet whatever it is. We don't know how strong he is but due to the amount of damage that he has done PLUS the damage he will do in the future is way more then Luffy. In comparison luffy defeated some warlords, Broke into Government facilities, a few territories, and he has vegapunk and Robin. On his run he has shown to not really do much. He doesn't randomly attack islands, and realistically he has harmed pirates more than he has the WG so I dont think they would find him much of a threat to them compared to Dragon that has been messing with them for years and on a MUCH larger scale than luffy.
My favorite part of One Piece powerscaling is when a character shows ANY haki feat and people start analyzing it to see what kind of haki they are using.
